name: Infiltrator (itch) (Fahood)
description:
Controls:

W, A, S, D - walk 

E - interact

Right Mouse Button - Zoom in

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Middle Mouse Button - weapon switch menu

Left Shift - Sprint (when holding W)

CTRL - Crouch

This game was made for the GameJolt girls in games jam but ended up losing so i'm uploading it here to let others play it for themselves.

it is pretty short; having only a single level with 2 parts in it, but they do communicate the idea of how the gameplay will be pretty well. the theme and style featured in the game are not final, due to the amount of time that the jam offered me i was unable to finalize my vision of it.

New story theme and setting: 

the game is set in a fictional universe from the 1870's to the 1890's where Edison is in control of the countries military and has discovered electric weaponry which were then refined with the help of Tesla. after Edison's betrayal he ordered to get Tesla locked up to keep him from speaking out about his misfortune and ruin Edison's reputation and credibility in the public eye. luckily, before Tesla's capture he found a secret ancient technology which allows him to create machines with consciousness, and that is what you play as throughout the game.

there are plans to develop the game further but i lack the propper man power and funding in order to make the game
